name: Pottery Wheel Throwing for Beginners (Clay Play)
description: Learn centering, pulling and shaping on the wheel, then trim and glaze your own cup or bowl over two sessions. Friendly tutors, small groups and all materials included make this a calming, hands-on creative reset minutes from central Bucharest.
notes: Address on site; sessions listed. (Check current schedule.)

name: Hand-Building Ceramics Workshop (ArtTime Atelier)
description: Pinch, coil and slab techniques to craft a mug or planter; learn surface decoration and glazing basics. Ideal for first-timers seeking a mindful, tactile session without the wheel.

name: Contemporary Jewelry Making (Assamblage Institute)
description: Romania's flagship jewelry school guides you through saw-piercing, filing, soldering and finishing to produce a silver piece. Short modules and accredited tracks available in a boutique studio near the Jewish quarter.
notes: Institute & gallery address public; frequent courses.

name: Stained Glass (Tiffany Technique) Workshop
description: Cut, foil and solder colored glass to assemble a small sun-catcher or lamp panel. Learn safety, pattern transfer and patination in a guided, beginner-friendly course.
notes: Also see Atelier Vitralii site for course details.

name: Intro to Woodworking (NOD Makerspace)
description: Get hands-on with saws, planers and sanders to design and build a simple object under pro supervision. Safety briefing and materials provided in Bucharest's premier makerspace.

name: Cyanotype & Screen Printing Lab (Allkimik)
description: Expose botanical prints on light-sensitive paper or pull your own screen-printed tote. Friendly artists demo each step and share tips to continue at home.

name: Painting & Drawing Class (Art & Hobby Studio)
description: Guided acrylic or watercolor sessions cover composition, color mixing and brushwork. Choose one-off classes or short modules; all materials available on site.

name: Specialty Coffee Cupping & Barista Basics
description: Taste single-origin coffees, learn grind profiles, extraction and milk texturing, then pull your own espresso in a short barista primer led by specialty pros.
notes: Sessions announced on socials; call to book

name: Mixology & Cocktail Fundamentals (Exquisite Bar Solutions)
description: Build balanced sours, stirred drinks and signatures while learning spirits, ice and bar tools from Romania's championship bartenders inside the historic Palatul Bragadiru.
notes: Address & phones on site; frequent cohorts

name: Sourdough & Pastry Fundamentals (Horeca Culinary School)
description: Hands-on modules in dough handling, lamination and natural leavening. Learn shaping, scoring and baking with pro ovens, then take recipes and starter home.

name: Homebakers by Grain Trip (Bread & Viennoiserie)
description: Bake world-style loaves and laminated pastries with Bucharest's beloved sourdough bakery. Short, friendly workshops; ingredients and gear supplied.

name: Chocolate Tasting Foundations (Artisan HUB events)
description: Calibrate your palate across cacao origins and styles; learn tempering basics and pairing notes in a guided session hosted at Artisan HUB in central Bucharest.

name: Old Town Street Food Tour (Small Group)
description: Sample covrigi, mici and craft desserts while exploring Lipscani's lanes with a foodie host. Includes tastings, local stories and dietary flexibility on request.
notes: Use specific Bucharest food tour listing for booking

name: Urban Hammam & Thermal Circuit (Orhideea Spa)
description: Steam, scrub and foam ritual followed by pools, sauna and relaxation lounge in a modern city spa. Add a targeted massage for a deeper reset.

name: Shiseido Spa Rituals at Stejarii Country Club
description: Premium rituals using Japanese techniques in treatment suites beside Băneasa forest. Combine sauna, pool and couple's treatments for an elegant escape.
notes: Book direct; club access policies apply

name: Float Therapy Session (Sensory Deprivation)
description: One hour in a warm, silent Epsom-salt pod reduces stimulus and invites deep calm. Towels and showers provided; arrive early for briefing.

name: Gong & Sound Bath (The Inner)
description: Lie back for waves of gongs, bowls and chimes that soothe the nervous system. Breath-led arrival, blankets provided; perfect for evening decompression.

name: Intro to Raja Yoga Meditation (Brahma Kumaris)
description: Gentle, free sessions introduce thought management and open-eye meditation in a quiet Cotroceni space. Great for first-timers and calm seekers.

name: Tai Chi & Qigong Classes (Taijidao)
description: Slow, flowing forms and breathwork taught in a calm studio; outdoor park practice in good weather. Excellent for posture, joints and stress relief.

name: Quick Reset: Aesthetic Coffee Spots (15–30 min)
description: Slip in for a beautiful cup, quick emails and a palate refresh in photogenic cafés near the center. Ideal between calls or before a meeting.
notes: Use listed cafés below as venues

name: Quick Reset: Bookstore Browsing at Cărturești
description: Drift through beautifully curated shelves and design displays; grab a seat for 15–30 quiet minutes. Great for solo unwinding in the Old Town or on Verona Street.

name: Quick Reset: MNAC Rooftop Terrace View
description: Ride the elevator to the museum's top-floor café terrace for a surprising skyline angle over the Parliament area—perfect golden-hour photos in 20 minutes.

name: Quick Reset: Macca–Vilacrosse Passage Stroll
description: Slip under stained-glass arcades for a short color-therapy walk and a few photos. Covered lane makes it usable in light rain; cafés line the route.

name: Japanese Garden Stroll (King Michael I Park)
description: Maples, stone lanterns and seasonal blooms make this tranquil corner perfect for a mindful loop and quick reset; benches nearby for journaling.

name: Urban Nature Walk & Birdwatching (Văcărești)
description: Follow levees and boardwalks in Europe's urban delta to spot herons and raptors. Quiet, flat paths; guided options available via local NGO.

name: Arthouse Cinema Session (Elvire Popesco)
description: Catch award-winning francophone films with subtitles in a beloved single-screen cinema. Easy solo plan or cozy date night.

name: Classic Film at Cinemateca Eforie
description: National Film Archive screenings of restored classics and retrospectives—a quiet, reflective solo plan with cinephile vibes.

name: Photography Fundamentals (Academia F64)
description: Master exposure, composition and practical shooting with Romania's leading photo academy. Short intensives and accredited multi-week tracks available.

name: Intro to 3D Printing & Rapid Prototyping (NOD)
description: Design basics, slicing and FDM printer operation—learn to print a small object and take files home. Perfect first step into maker tech.

name: Intro to Programming (Școala Informală de IT)
description: Beginner-friendly modules in Python, QA or web dev with evening formats suited to working schedules—project-based learning and career mentoring included.

name: Tea Tasting & Ceremony (Cotroceni Teahouses)
description: Explore oolongs, matcha and rare blends with staff-guided tastings in cozy villas—perfect for mindful conversation or quiet solo time.

name: Express Beauty Reset (GETT'S Color Bar – malls)
description: Drop in for a tidy manicure, express facial or quick blow-dry between meetings at centrally located salons open late, seven days a week.

name: Self-Guided Architecture Audio Walk (Old Town)
description: Plug in an app-based audio tour for eclectic facades, arcades and hidden courtyards—wander at your pace with optional cafe pauses.
